page.title: 11Schools
page.content: Reepham Primary School holds about 240 pupils.The present school was opened on Monday,September 11th,1893.William Pitcher was the Headmaster at this time and pupils paid 2 old pence per week.In September 1954 the pupils from Salle,Haydon,Guestwick and Wood Dalling were transferred to Reepham. The present canteen was built around 1947.In 1963-64 central heating was installed.In 1952 flush toilets were fitted and connection to the sewers was made in 1959.Reepham High school was opened in 1960.Before that child- ren from five to fifteen went to the same school.The High School now holds about 550 pupils.In 1983 the old hall of the Primary School was converted into 3 classrooms and a science room and a new hall was added.
